Item.name: j_cip
Item.caption: Finite differential method of advection terms

Item.name: j_qsu
Item.caption: +Formula of upward flux of suspended load from river bed

Item.name: j_zb
Item.caption: +How to set elevation of fixed bed

Enumeration.caption: Use initial bed elevations of fixed bed cells
Use elevation data of fixed bed

Item.name: i_sec_hour
Item.caption: Time unit of discharge/water surface file

Item.name: discharge_waterlevel
Item.caption: Time series of discharge at upstream and water level at downstream

Item.name: j_qbup
Item.caption: +Change the supply rate of sediment from the upstream boundary

Item.name: cse
Item.caption: +The ratio of supplied sediment transport to an equilibrium sediment transport (%)

Item.name: ster
Item.caption:
Start Time of bed deformation (sec)
[Negative is no bed deformation]

Item.name: lmax
Item.caption: Maximum number of iterations of water surface calculation

Item.name: alh
Item.caption: Relaxation coefficient for water surface calculation

Item.name: h_slope
Item.caption: Initial water-surface slope of main channel

Item.name: x_bk
Item.caption: Distance of the break point from downstream end

Item.name: h_slope_1
Item.caption: Initial water-surface slope of downstream side

Item.name: h_slope_2
Item.caption: Initial water-surface slope of upstream side

Item.name: j_vege
Item.caption: Use the data of vegetation height in the cells ?

Item.name: j_m1
Item.caption: Starting cross sectional grid number of main channel(j_m1)

Item.name: j_m2
Item.caption: Ending cross sectional grid number of main channel(j_m2)

Item.name: j_t1
Item.caption: Starting cross sectional grid number of tributary(j_t1)

Item.name: j_t2
Item.caption: Ending cross sectional grid number of tributary(j_t2)

Item.name: i_t1
Item.caption: Longitudinal grid number where tributary starts(i_t1)

Item.name: i_t2
Item.caption: Longitudinal grid number where tributary ends(i_t2)

Item.name: j_mix_dis
Item.caption: Grain size distribution is given based on;

Item.name: mixfile_pp
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in mixed layer (passing percentage)

Item.name: mixfile_fr
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in mixed layer (fraction)

Item.name: j_mix_dis_dep
Item.caption: Grain size distribution in deposited layer is;

Item.name: mixfile_pp_d
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in deposited layer (passing percentage)

Item.name: mixfile_fr_d
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in deposited layer (fraction)

Item.name: e_thick
Item.caption: Thickness of movable bed layer under the initial bed(m)

Item.name: i_erosion_start
Item.caption: Bank erosion starting section number from upstream end

Item.name: i_erosion_end
Item.caption: Bank erosion end section number from downstream end

Item.name: tantc
Item.caption: Tangent value of the critical angle of repose of the bed material

Item.name: snst
Item.caption: Strength of secondary flows for sediment transport

Item.name: j_sf
Item.caption: Use a transport equation of vorticity for calculating a secondary flow

Item.name: a_snu
Item.caption: A for eddy viscosity coefficient (k/6u*h x A + B)

Item.name: b_snu
Item.caption: B for eddy viscosity coefficient (k/6u*h x A + B)

Item.name: n_parallel
Item.caption: Number of threads for parallel computation (Only multi core PC)

Item.name: read_flag
Item.caption: Calculate from initial or temporary file

Item.name: jop_zmin
Item.caption: Minimun bed elevation in the cross sections

Item.name: jop_zave
Item.caption: Averaged bed elevation in the cross sections

Item.name: jop_have
Item.caption: Averaged water level in the cross sections
